title: Bloomberg Markets: Kamhi Natural Disasters Impact on Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kamhi Natural Disasters Impact on Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Laurie Kamhi\u0010Managing Director\u0010Hightower's LCK Wealth Management \u0010Discussing why hurricanes, earthquakes and enormous natural disasters in the US, Mexico, Puerto Rico and Caribbean is the real story for short term and long term investing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
